Detailed Description

StealAlgorithm of a RFO thread

An instance of this class is attached for all instance of Thread.

Member Function Documentation

) [protected, virtual]

Definition of virtual RFO::ThreadStealAlgorithm::steal_frame This method is specialized to steal work that from a running DFG::Thread by trying to extract closures from the thread and adding code to send back result.

Reimplemented from RFO::ThreadStealAlgorithm.
